EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Oklahoma Demographic Change Request Form Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Oklahoma.
This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, for {!Case.Name_of_Provider_Group__c}.
Please see below for approximate processing times for the different request/inquiry types. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address submitted. PROVIDER NOTIFICATION - DEMOGRAPHIC ADD/CHANGE/TERM Please allow minimum 30-45 days for the request to be processed. To check the status of your case, please click on status checker({!$Setup.UtilitySettings_Hierarchy__c.CaseStatusUrl__c}) or for any questions, contact 1-800-722-3730 or email oknetworkmanagement@bcbsok.com.
Sincerely, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Oklahoma
